title: ArtyTorrent Pack 40-Hip Hop RnB Drum Loops 80-89bpm v1-WAV sampl
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 40-Hip Hop RnB Drum Loops 80-89bpm v1-WAV samples
------------------------------------------------------------------

I&#039;ve got tons of hip hop loops at various tempos. This pack is the first volume at 80-89 bpm.
Some of these loops sound live, but most are programmed using electronic sounds and are compressed quite heavily. Also perfect for R&#039;n&#039;B productions.

Torrent contains 4 RAR files with 114 loops.
--------------------------------------------
Elab Nu RnB 82-86 (29 loops)
Westside Underground 80-89 (16 loops)
Zero-G Hip Hop 80 (25 loops)
Zero-G Hip Hop 85 (44 loops)

All samples are normalized 16-bit Acidized WAVs at 44.1KHz, looped precisely and containing the approx bpm in the filenames, ready to be dropped into your own productions, or chopped up and effected as you wish.

The samples are from a variety of sources including CDs produced by E-lab and Sony/Acid.

I think I&#039;ll post some faster beats before coming back for volume 2 at this tempo, but we&#039;ll see...

--
Arty - "Hip Hop Don&#039;t Stop".
7th February 2008.
